name: Hold up Mom!
description:
Controls

Walk with WASD or the Arrow Keys and interact with the Spacebar.

Setting

After a day of playing games and fooling around you totally forgot to clean up your room and now your Mom comes back early!

Your Task

In this “Home Alone” simulator you have to try everything to delay your Moms entrance into your room by blocking her path with furniture or distract her with different interactable objects.

But be careful, if your actions are making her angry, the messy room is your lesser problem.
